SELECT id,org_pid,org_pids,is_leaf,org_name,address,phone,email,org_sort,level,status FROM sys_org o
AND (org_pids like CONCAT('%[',#{rootOrgId},']%') OR id = #{rootOrgId})
AND org_name like CONCAT('%',#{orgNameLike},'%')
AND status = #{orgStatus}
ORDER BY level,org_sort

SELECT id,menu_pid,menu_pids,is_leaf,menu_name,url,icon,menu_sort,level,status,hidden,view_import FROM sys_menu o
AND (menu_pids like CONCAT('%[',#{rootMenuId},']%') OR id = #{rootMenuId})
AND menu_name like CONCAT('%',#{menuNameLike},'%')
AND status = #{menuStatus}
ORDER BY level,menu_sort

SELECT id,api_pid,api_pids,is_leaf,api_name,url,api_sort,level,status FROM sys_api o
AND (api_pids like CONCAT('%[',#{rootApiId},']%') OR id = #{rootApiId})
AND api_name like CONCAT('%',#{apiNameLike},'%')
AND status = #{apiStatus}
ORDER BY level,api_sort
SELECT distinct id FROM sys_api a WHERE a.level = 2
SELECT distinct id FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.level = 2

SELECT distinct m.id,menu_pid,menu_pids,is_leaf,menu_name,url,icon,menu_sort,level,status,hidden,view_import FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.account_no = ur.account_no WHERE u.account_no = #{accountNo} AND m.status = 0 ORDER BY level,menu_sort
